entry.title: Beverly Baby Crop Top
entry.summary:
Vendor: Better Baby Boutique
Type: Baby Girl Shirts
Price: 9.99

The Beverly Baby Crop Top is the crop top you have dreamed up! This sweet sophisticated design is stunning to say the least. The ideal piece to transition with into Fall. The styling variations with this gem could be endless. Mix and match this cutie with all her wardrobe favorites for looks that will surely inspire! Don’t forget that the Beverly Crop Top also pairs perfectly with the Beverly Baby Blazer and Beverly Baby Girl Trousers.

entry.title: Beverly Baby Girl Blazer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Better Baby Boutique
Type: Baby Girl Shirts
Price: 14.99

If this Beverly Baby Girl Blazer came momma size, we would be all over it! We are certain your mini fashionista will approve this chic Fall staple. While it lasts this blazer is sure to be a favorite in this seasons wardrobe. Pair with shorts, denim, jeans, or the perfect match Beverly Baby Girl Trousers and we just know you can’t go wrong.  Cozy and fashion forward, we just know you will love this blazer!

entry.title: Vibes Baby Girl One Sleeve Crop Top
entry.summary:
Vendor: Better Baby Boutique
Type: Baby Girl Shirts
Price: 10.99

The Vibes Baby Girl One Sleeve Crop Top is a single shoulder crop style beauty! This fashion forward baby girl top is easy on the eyes, feels great and is so versatile. Styling this adorable baby girl shirt will be easy and fun! We simply can’t say enough about this trendy little piece. We hope you love it as much as we do!

entry.title: Peony Baby Girl Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Better Baby Boutique
Type: Baby Girl Shirts
Price: 11.99

So chic, we can’t get over the cuteness overload coming off the Peony Baby Girl Shirt. This ribbed medium crop is summer in a top! We adore the pale pink that easy mix and matches with everything. The sweetest mini swoop adds charm along the neck design for a bit more pop. Cozy and fabulous we are over the moon with this little too and just know you and your mini fashionista will love it too!

entry.title: Cognac Cutie Baby Sweater
entry.summary:
Vendor: Better Baby Boutique
Type:
Price: 10.99

This stylish and chic gender neutral Cognac Cutie Baby Sweater is everything right now! We are head over sleeves for this gem. Style with all him/her favorites for a look that is simply unstoppable. Your mini will love how they feel in this little top and you will adore the way they look. The perfect addition to her already perfectly curated wardrobe!

entry.title: Patched Leopard Baby Girl Sweater

Either way this will be a staple in her wardrobe this season!

entry.title: Blush Rainbow Baby Sweater

Style with all her favorite bottoms, or snatch this beauty a size or two up and pair with stockings. The combinations are endless and we are so excited to be introducing this beauty to you!

This sweet, soft, stylish sweater is everything and more! Introducing the fabulous So In Knit Baby Girl Sweater.
